footnote-body: "We assume that the worlds all have a two-valued well-founded model."
sentence-with-footnote: "We thus get a probability distribution over worlds from which we can define a probability distribution over the truth values of a ground atom: the probability of an atom q being true is the sum of the probabilities of the worlds where q is true******."
"The AKSW research group of Leipzig is currently developing SML-Bench******
column5: a benchmark tool to ease the testing and the comparison of learning systems for structured data."
